concept.title: Preview Codes
concept.shortdesc: When you preview data, the Preview panel uses different colors to represent different types of data. The Preview panel also uses colors, italics, and asterisks to highlight the field values and records that you have changed for testing.

conbody.p:
data previewcolor codesThe following table describes the color and asterisk coding:
Preview Code Description
Black values Date data
Blue values Numeric data
Green values String data
Red values Boolean data
Asterisk Records that include edited field values
Red italic field labels Fields that contain edited data
Italic values Edited data
Green stage First stage in a multiple-stage preview
Red stage Last stage in a multiple-stage preview
